sentences.sContent: Divorce is very painful, especially when children are concerned.
sentences.sCn: 离婚是非常痛苦的，涉及孩子的话更是如此。

sentences.sContent: Some of the farmers concerned suffer particularly from the low prices.
sentences.sCn: 涉及的农民当中，有些人因低价受到的损失尤为惨重。

sentences.sContent: We are trying to reach an agreement with all concerned (= everyone who is involved or affected ) .
sentences.sCn: 我们试图与相关各方达成协议。

phrases.pCn: 当事人；有关方面；协议双方；当事者

words.tran: 担心地；关心公众事务地

trans.tranOther: involved in something or affected by it

trans.tranCn: 关心（concern的过去时和过去分词）；与…有关
